body.name: Handheld Steam Cleaner, Pressurized Multi-Surface Steam Cleaner with 9 Accessories, Chemical Free Steam Cleaner for Home Use, Steamer for Cleaning Floor, Furniture, Upholstery, Grout, and Car
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 9 hrs 55 mins
features: 𝙋𝙤𝙬𝙚𝙧𝙛𝙪𝙡 𝙎𝙩𝙚𝙖𝙢 𝙁𝙤𝙧 𝘾𝙡𝙚𝙖𝙣𝙞𝙣𝙜: This handheld steam cleaner heats up quickly for 3 minutes to produce powerful hot steam at 230°F(110°C). 1050W pressurized steam cleaner can deeply clean oil, dust, and stubborn stains, even in hard-to-reach and sticky areas. Enjoy a cleaner home with our efficient steam cleaner!

𝘾𝙝𝙚𝙢𝙞𝙘𝙖𝙡-𝙛𝙧𝙚𝙚 & 𝙎𝙖𝙛𝙚: The handheld steam cleaner uses high temperature and high-pressure steam to remove dirt and stains, safe and reliable. 100% chemical free no harmful fumes or residues. The pressurized steam cleaner has safety lock technology to prevent improper handling by children and also adds an extra layer of protection to your safety.

𝙈𝙪𝙡𝙩𝙞-𝙋𝙪𝙧𝙥𝙤𝙨𝙚 𝙎𝙩𝙚𝙖𝙢𝙚𝙧: Our multi-surface steam cleaner for cleaning includes an exclusive free 9-piece accessory kit. Includes: an extension hose, small brush, jet nozzle, bent nozzle, upholstery tool, window cleaning tool, towel cloth, measuring cup, and funnel. Upholstery steam cleaner to reach any hard-to-reach area for targeted cleaning.

𝙇𝙖𝙧𝙜𝙚 𝘾𝙖𝙥𝙖𝙘𝙞𝙩𝙮 𝙒𝙖𝙩𝙚𝙧 𝙏𝙖𝙣𝙠: This handheld steam cleaner comes with 350 ml (recommended load capacity of up to 280 ml to allow room for normal use) and the oversized tank allows you to focus on cleaning rather than constantly replenishing water. Lightweight and portable, you can easily take this handheld steam cleaner anywhere to handle quick work around your house, office, garage, etc.

𝙇𝙞𝙜𝙝𝙩𝙬𝙚𝙞𝙜𝙝𝙩 𝘼𝙣𝙙 𝙋𝙤𝙧𝙩𝙖𝙗𝙡𝙚: The handheld steam cleaner comes with a 9.8ft power cord that you can easily take anywhere you need it. Whether it's your living room, bathroom, kitchen, bedroom, or any other area, our upholstery steamer cleaner allows you to achieve thorough cleaning.
body.description: Handheld steam cleaners, 1050W powerful steam cleaner, 230℉(110℃) high pressured steam, 9-piece accessory.The handheld steam cleaner is a good helper for cleaning the household, helping you easily resolve hard and sticky spots.Rapid Steam HeatingHandheld steam cleaner quickly heats water to 110℃/230℉ in 3 minutes, which can physically clean stains without being harmful.Security Lock TechnologyWe have Safety Lock technology with a safety lock and cap on the handle and precise temperature control.100% Chemical FreeHand-held steam cleaners use hot, pressurized steam to clean without chemicals, making them safe and residue-free.How To UseStep 1: Open the safety cap. Using a measuring cup and funnel add no more than 280ml water, then close the cap.Step 2: Plug in the power cord and wait for about 2-3 mins for heating. When the green light turns off, it means the heating finished and it’s ready for use.Step 3: Choose and wear the most suitable accessories for different materials, surfaces, angles, gaps and cornersPackage Includes:1* Handheld Steam Cleaner1× Round Brush1× Jet nozzle1× Extension hose1× Bent nozzle1× Upholstery tool1× Window cleaning tool1× Towel cloth1× Measuring cup1× Funnel1×User Manual
